title: Can I purchase 3 RP?
body: Hello!  I am sitting at 1497 RP and I want to buy two 750 RP skins, but I'm 3 RP short.  Is it possible to make a 3RP micro transaction?

replies.body:
You can't purchase 3 RP, since it's too little of an amount, but maybe we can work something out if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this amount. :D

Let me know if you have any questions.
I think you meant to type can't? Just letting you know :P
